ont_fast5_api is a simple interface to HDF5 files of the Oxford Nanopore FAST5 file format.
- Concrete implementation of the FAST5 file schema using the generic h5py library - Plain-english-named methods to interact with and reflect the FAST5 file schema - Tools to convert between multi_read and single_read formats - Tools to compress/decompress raw data in files
